note.p: Baptism: Littleham, Devon, England, Europe (19 January 1617)
Death: His house, Nutwell Court, Woodbury, near Exeter, Devon, England, Europe (c September 1684)
Burial: Woodbury Church, Devon, England, Europe (12 September 1684)

Career: Deputy-Lieutenant of Devon (1676-death); MP for Lostwithiel (1660); MP for Tiverton (1664-1681); Secretary to Lord Lieutenant of Ireland (1669-1670, 1672-1673); Commissioner for Sick and Wounded (1672-1674)
Committee appointments include: Committee for Agriculture [Georgical] (1664)
Other RSActivity: Placed on the list of Fellows to be left out due to non-payment of arrears.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Foster; Hunter; Henning; ODNB
Notes: Hunter gives his year of birth as 1617.
